name: Winch
author: Hacktix
description: A simple Harmony-based mod loader for DREDGE.
latest_release_description:
## Winch
- Now uses HarmonyX
- Updated game libs
- New `EnumUtil` class for helping modders to parse or create enums during runtime
- Custom fish now get added to encyclopedia
- Item IDs must be unique now. It will error if you have duplicate items.
- Fixed a bug that stops you from reloading your save after exiting to main menu
- Fixed item data converters not including base class fields
- Added a ton of missing fields and default values for existing item data converters
- Fix nets ignoring slots that only accept certain item types when you pickup and place an item
- Item type icons
- New item data types
  - `Durable`
  - `Nets`
- New asset folder `GridConfigs` for making trawl nets' and crab pots' inventory grid.
- Can now actually make fish aberrations and connect them to their original version.
- New POI type `Items`. A spot that you can pick up 1 item from. Vanilla uses this for message in a bottles.
- Fix item poi handler to not decrease stock when item cannot fit in inventory (for the ItemPOIs above)

### Example Items
- Added harvest POI that was sitting in project but wasn't actually copied to the mod build
- Added tons of more examples
  - POIs for actually getting these items (they are all by the Gale Cliffs Pontoon)
  - Aberrations
  - Crab
  - Trinket
  - Fishing Rod
  - Crab Pot
  - Trawl Net
  - Engine
  - Light
  - Relic
  - Researchable Book
  - Message in a Bottle
  - Note
  - Journal 

**Generated From PR: https://github.com/DREDGE-Mods/Winch/pull/20**

name: Cosmic Horror Fishing Buddies
author: xen-42
description: A multiplayer mod for DREDGE using Mirror and Winch
latest_release_description: - Now works with patch 1.4.0 and The Pale Reach

name: Disaster Button
author: Hacktix
description: Trigger sanity events via button press

name: Unity Explorer
author: bdlm-dev
description: Build of sinai-dev's Unity Explorer for DREDGE
latest_release_description:
Current builds of my DREDGE mods.
For Winch alpha-1.3
# Mods
- AdjustHoodedFigures
| Restart any failed Hooded Figure quests.
- ConfigChanger
| Creates Config.Json file allowing editing of base game attributes.
| More than 60 modifiable game attributes.
| Installation information in [README](https://github.com/bdlm-dev/dredge-mods#configchanger).
| Attribute information [here](https://github.com/bdlm-dev/dredge-mods/edit/main/ConfigChanger).

- EnableUnityExplorer
| Implements [UnityExplorer](https://github.com/sinai-dev/UnityExplorer)
| Altered UnityExplorer STANDALONE Mono available [here](https://github.com/bdlm-dev/DREDGE-UnityExplorer/releases)

# Changes
**Changelog**: https://github.com/bdlm-dev/dredge-mods/compare/2023-04-27...2023-04-28
- Port all mods to alpha-1.3
- ConfigChanger
| Include custom attribute "removeBoundary" to remove out of bounds warning and events.

name: Rare Fish Restock
author: MegaPiggy
description: Makes the fish from the Recording Rarities pursuit replenish themselves just like every other fish
latest_release_description: No longer restocks relics, quests, and research parts. (I didn't account for these in first version)

name: Quest Item Unlocker
author: xen-42
description: Resets relic dredge spots, so you can dredge them up again.
latest_release_description: - Fixes the Family Crest

name: Dredge VR
author: xen-42
description: A VR mod for Dredge
latest_release_description:
The Pale Reach should all work properly now with this update

- Cutscenes in The Pale Reach DLC now actually play out
- Fix infected fish particle orientation
- Hide laser pointers when hiding UI
- Show "UNBOUND" in tutorial popups if an input is missing
- Fix snow position on Pale Reach title screen
- Removed the "disable distance particles" option because it was buggy
- Fixed message entries disappearing when changing tabs
- Fixed held message positions

name: Fast Dock
author: MegaPiggy
description: Dock at triple the normal speed
latest_release_description: Fixed mod_meta.json

name: Encyclopedia Lookup
author: nogarcia
description: A DREDGE mod that adds a button to look up fish in the encylopedia
latest_release_description:
First version! Either download the release manually and extract it to your Winch mod folder, or download the mod from the Available tab in the mod manager.

Press <kbd>L</kbd> while hovering over a fish to open the encyclopedia to the page containing the fish.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/nogarcia/DredgeLookup/commits/v1.0.0

name: Detailed Console Logs
author: xen-42
description: Logs more info to the console in Dredge
latest_release_description: - Logs more info to the console in Dredge

name: Dredge Free Cam
author: xen-42
description: Toggle the DREDGE debug free cam by pressing 0!
latest_release_description: Press 0 to toggle debug free cam

name: RGB Pots
author: nogarcia
description: Adds informational colored lights to crab pots
latest_release_description:
First version! Either download the release manually and extract it to your Winch mod folder, or download the mod from the Available tab in the mod manager.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/nogarcia/DredgeLookup/commits/v1.0.0

name: Reduced Rod Requirements
author: xen-42
description: Fishing with the wrong equipment will behave like broken equipment (can still fish, but slowly)
latest_release_description: - Fishing with the wrong equipment will behave like broken equipment (can still fish, but slowly)

name: Auto Fish
author: xen-42
description: Skips the fishing/dredging mini-games
latest_release_description: - Skips the fishing/dredging mini-games

name: Monstrous Ship
author: xen-42
description: Replaces ship graphics with a monster
latest_release_description:
- Updated to use Winch
- Fixed a bunch of collision issues

name: Stress and Taxes
author: Johncook2
description: An unfinished mod about making dredge harder.
latest_release_description:
A semi complete version of stress and taxes with some basic changes. Should* work.

(All changes this update are credited to Mega Piggy.)

name: Instant Discard
author: xen-42
description: Discard fish instantly instead of having to hold the button down.
latest_release_description: Discard fish instantly instead of having to hold the button down.

name: MorePeaceful
author: SeaKestrel
description: Add a real peaceful mode to Dredge
latest_release_description: Add a real peaceful mode to Dredge

name: BoatChanger
author: SeaKestrel
description: Choose the boat's aspect
latest_release_description: Choose the boat's aspect

name: Full Aberration Rods
author: SeaKestrel
description: Modify the Viscera Crane rod to allow you to combine all rods with aberration bonus in your boat
latest_release_description: Modify the Viscera Crane rod to allow you to combine all rods with aberration bonus in your boat

name: DredgeRichPresence
author: SeaKestrel
description: A better rich presence for discord
latest_release_description:
- Added support for the Pale Reach
- Fixed Stellar Basin not showing

*Thanks to MegaPiggy for contributing*

name: Persistent Markers
author: MegaPiggy
description: Markers will display consistently, without the need of equipping your Spyglass. Also makes the drop-off harsher for how soon icons disappear from view when looking away (otherwise it's annoying)
latest_release_description: First release

name: Custom Loading Screen
author: MegaPiggy
description: Replace the loading screen with your own custom image. Must be a .png, and will be loaded from Assets\LoadingScreen.png
latest_release_description: First release

name: Mo' Money
author: MegaPiggy
description: Allows customizing sell multipliers (i.e. 0.5x, 2x, 3x, and any other multiplier you want) of all fish and trinkets via editing json files.
latest_release_description: First release

name: Auto Resume
author: MegaPiggy
description: Presses the continue button as soon as the title screen first loads.
latest_release_description: First release
